promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong gorilla normal-type pokemon holding a ornate sword. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bladegruff, a a massive strong gorilla normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Accelerating Stab. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "normal" or "Bladegruff". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, gorilla-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: This robust behemoth, often found in verdant plains, uses Accelerating Stab with its sturdy digits. Always on guard, it's rarely outmaneuvered.
